articles.title: Hong Kong's Jumbo floating restaurant sinks at sea
articles.description: An iconic Hong Kong floating restaurant has sunk, just days after it was towed out to sea en route to an unspecified destination.
articles.content:

articles.title: New Mexico’s Largest Wildfire Was Set by the Government. What Are Victims Owed?
articles.description: Two prescribed burns got out of control, becoming New Mexico’s largest recorded wildfire and generating backlash. But experts say it’s necessary to thin forests in a region primed for destruction.
